@50c3nt: great job! but could you please update the DCL? If this DCL was uploaded on Jan 15 then it's the version that'd been pulled off by BioWare due to bugs. An updated Ostagar was re-released only now (Jan 31 or Feb 01).
I would also like to know if the newly re-released return to ostagar is different from the version here? If so i would prefer the new one.

I would assume that up to this date, the newest version of Return to Ostagar hasn't been uploaded to any torrent yet. All these ones flying around are the one with Mage Skill bug. It will add the 2nd Drain Life skill slot to every mage skill tree.

Just gonna say something about this DLC

The purpose of this DLC is to continue the Storyline , it's meant to be played in the middle of the game, in particular in between two separate quests , before the Final Battle. 

This DLC is important when it comes to continuity for The Awakening coming later this March. 

You may think it's boring but if you love this game enough to want to buy and play the second incarnation/expansion. This DLC is pivotal
